ingredients.item: 15ml Monin Gum sugar syrup, or see tip below
Top with Waitrose Sparkling Cox Apple and Elderflower Refresher
Green apple slices, halved, to garnish

instructions.step: Shake the juices and syrup over ice and strain into an ice-filled sling (or highball) glass, top with the refresher.
Garnish with apple slices on the glass rim.
